scripts.wasm: yarn clean && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg && scripts/pack-wasm.cjs
scripts.build: yarn wasm && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: swc ./pkg -C module.type=commonjs -d dist/cjs --copy-files && cp pkg/chopsticks_executor.d.ts dist/cjs/index.d.ts && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.build:esm: swc ./pkg -C module.type=es6 -d dist/esm --copy-files && cp pkg/chopsticks_executor.d.ts dist/esm/index.d.ts && echo '{"type": "module"}' > dist/esm/package.json
